Posts.Content: Aug 25, 2011 06:46AM Lindaqs wrote: Hello everyone.  Thank you so much for all your posts.  It has been so helpful.  Finished up A/C last week 4 doses every other week.  What a milestone to finish that up and move on to the second 1/2 of treatment.  4 doses Taxol ever other week.  My MO had originally said I would not have Neulasta shot any longer with the Taxol, however, she decided to stay with Neulasta through the rest of the treatment.
Posts.Title: Can anyone list Taxol and Herceptin Side effects? Southamptonmom Southamptonmom
